apply.title: Apply
apply.description: Academy students are given an opportunity to be immersed in a professional two-month course for the front-end developers, build their competence through trainings and individual or groups assignments.

admission.title: Pass the admission
admission.description: Entry test is performed by those candidates who submit their summary. Test results define a priority list of candidates who are invited into the workshop. We accept 20 candidates with highest marks into academy.

learn.title: Learn from the experts
learn.description: Students will discover all types, techniques and design approaches. They will learn how to write semantic elements in HTML, apply advanced CSS techniques, understand accessibility standards and many more.

company.title: Join the company
company.description: The Academy starts in the end of October and lasts until January. Top graduates will be invited for an interview to become a Junior Front-End Software Engineer.
